text:
Weaviate Academy Unit 1: Set Up. 
in this section we'll get you set upwith your own instance of ev8 as well asa client Librarywe'll review different options thatexist for deploying leviate and thenshow you how you can get set up withyour own free instance of webiate usingvv8 cloud serviceswe'll also show you how to install a V8client Library through which you caninteract with leviate in your preferredlanguageby the time you're done with thissection you'll be set up to get reallyHands-On by interacting with livewaviate instances including running yourown queries in the very next sectionokay see you soon
name: Hello Weaviate - Set Up
